original_text: Your old nature likes to do bad things that belong to this earth. But your old nature is dead, so do not do these bad things any more. Do not have sex with someone that you are not married to. Do not think bad, disgusting thoughts. Do not want to have sex in a wrong way. Do not want to do any kinds of bad things. Do not want to have many things for yourselves. That shows that you worship those things as your idol.
korean_text: 그러므로 땅에 있는 지체를 죽이라 곧 음란과 부정과 사욕과 악한 정욕과 탐심이니 탐심은 우상 숭배니라

sentences.original_text: Your old nature likes to do bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 옛 본성은 나쁜 일들을 하는 것을 좋아합니다

sentences.original_text: But your old nature is dead
so do not do these bad things any more
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 더 이상 이 나쁜 일들을 하지 마십시오

sentences.original_text: Do not have sex with someone that you are not married to
sentences.korean_translation: 결혼하지 않은 사람과 성관계를 가지지 마십시오

sentences.original_text: Do not think bad, disgusting thoughts
Do not want to have sex in a wrong way
Do not want to do any kinds of bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 종류의 나쁜 일도 하고 싶어하지 마십시오

sentences.original_text: Do not want to have many things for yourselves
sentences.korean_translation: 자신을 위해 많은 것들을 갖고 싶어하지 마십시오

sentences.original_text: That shows that you worship those things as your idol
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 당신이 그것들을 우상으로 숭배한다는 것을 보여줍니다
